customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Incoming Webhooks — Incoming webhook is image only
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Replace the existing payload text with one of the payloads shown in the test data field
  2. Send it
inline.testData:
Payload will land in channel as defined in webhook on Mattermost:
{"attachments":[{"image_url":"https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/10/10/22/24/wide-format-2839089_960_720.jpg"}]}

–––––––––––––––––––––––––

Payload will land in channel specified (and username) as defined in the payload below:
{"channel": "off-topic", "username": "new_username", "attachments":[{"image_url":"https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/10/10/22/24/wide-format-2839089_960_720.jpg"}], "icon_url": "http://www.mattermost.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/icon_WS.png"}
inline.expectedResult:
• Webapp and RN show the image correctly main thread
  • Webapp shows the image properly in reply thread

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Invalid) RN: regression, Message attachments without text is not rendering the fallback — MM-13233
